category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Resolve Toxicity

action.primary: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, reduces swelling and disperses Stagnation

indications: Abscesses, swelling, toxic sores and deep-rooted furuncles.

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Spleen Deficiency.
Contraindicated for those with loose stools.
Contraindicated for those with clear urine.

useCases: Abscesses and furuncles with localized redness, swelling, heat and pain
Hepatic cancer, breast cancer, and some forms of lymphoma
Breast abscesses and fibrocystic breast disorder with red, painful, palpable masses
